document_data.name: Magebanes
document_data.mainbody: The '''Magebanes''' were a group of [[adventurer]]s who operated ''circa'' [[1369 DR]]. They were warriors who were notable for disdaining and distrusting all sorts of [[magic]]al [[spell]]s and items.
document_data.History:
In the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, the Magebanes attended a party hosted by Lord [[Partic Thistle]] at [[Thistleflame Manor]] in [[Suzail]]. The occasion was King [[Azoun Obarskyr IV]]'s birthday, and Lord Thistle hoped to improve the standing of adventuring companies in Cormyr by having them present themselves as a gesture of fealty to the King.

After the festivities, it appeared that Lord Thistle had been murdered by extraordinary means, but the Magebane's aversion to using spells or magical items made them an unlikely culprits.
